replies.body:
1. Go to imgur.
2. Click Upload
3. Go to screenshots folder in minecraft, select your pic
4. Click ok> Upload
5. Wait (hardest part)
6. Copy and pasta

replies.body: It was quite a discussion yesterday when I was attacked with harrasments, I was called nigger many times and I was told to suck a cock. I'm greatful to glitchy as he kicked this/these players, I do feel though a warning isn't enough, I would like Avicus to be more strict with this kind of behavior. I still see myself as a new player as I've only been here for a month, I got attacked the first time a day after I joined and I don't think Avicus want a reputation like that.

replies.body: Staff aren't always online and able to check reports, and I apologise about this incident. Just a suggestion, if you are afraid of your parents or what not walking in on your with offensive language in your screen, you can turn down the opacity (Basically the see through level) of chat in settings. Also, a door lock helps ;)
replies.body_tagged: Staff aren't always online and able to check reports, and I apologise about this incident. Just a suggestion, if you are afraid of your parents or what not walking in on your with offensive language in your screen, you can turn down the opacity (Basically the see through level) of chat in settings. Also, a door lock helps ;)

replies.body:
I'm gonna lay this on you as kindly as possible:

Listen to Mountie.
Listen to Bader. 
And in my opinion disallowing the use of language is undoubtably censorship, which I believe is plainly stupid and ludacrous.

Honestly if you don't want bad language, turn chat off and play the game.

My work here is done.
